abstract: NATO formally invites Montenegro to become alliance's 29th member; informal invitation extended to militarily insignificant nation in December, 2015, irritated Russia, wich saw move as gratuitous provocation.
lead_paragraph: NATO made a formal invitation on Thursday to tiny Montenegro to join the alliance as its 29th member, a move Russia strongly objects to.

headline.main: NATO Invites Montenegro to Join Alliance
headline.print_headline: Montenegro Is Invited to Join NATO

snippet: NATO made a formal invitation on Thursday to tiny Montenegro to join the alliance as its 29th member, a move Russia strongly objects to.
